title: Sumac and Moor Mother Announce Album, Share New Song “Scene 1”: Listen
description: The artists’ new collaborative album, The Film, is coming out via Thrill Jockey
author: Walden Green
excerpt: The artists’ new collaborative album, The Film, is coming out via Thrill Jockey

html:
The artists’ new collaborative album, The Film, is coming out via Thrill Jockey

Experimental metal trio Sumac and Philadelphia-based poet and noise artist Moor Mother have announced a new collaborative album: The Film arrives April 25 on Thrill Jockey and opens with the new song “Scene 1.” Listen to it and check out the full tracklist below.

Sumac’s latest album, The Healer, came out last year. Also in 2024, Moor Mother released her album The Great Bailout.

Read about The Healer at No. 13 in Pitchfork’s list of “The 30 Best Rock Albums of 2024.”

The Film:

01 Scene 1
02 Scene 2: The Run
03 Hard Truth
04 Scene 3
05 Scene 4
06 Camera
07 The Truth Is Out There
08 Scene 5: Breathing Fire
